thread.title: Beyoncé gets patriotic with the Stars and Stripes for a new magazine cover - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Beyoncé gets patriotic with the Stars and Stripes for a new magazine cover - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Harry Fletcher
title: Beyoncé gets patriotic with the Stars and Stripes for a new magazine cover - Showbiz
text: Beyoncé was seemingly in a patriotic mood as she posed with the Stars and Stripes for a recent photoshoot.She looks as fierce as ever with the Star-Spangled Banner in the image, which features on the front cover of the winter edition of The BEAT. © Instagram / thebeatjuiceBeyonce on the cover of Beat issue 16 The shoot took place in the Hamptons and was conducted by Ryan McGinley.Meanwhile, Beyoncé could be set to topple Justin Bieber's reign at the top of the UK charts with Naughty Boy collaboration 'Runnin' (Lose It All)'.Bizarrely, the musician came under fire recently from X Factor winner Sam Bailey, who criticised her for a 'lack of decency' when they performed together.Elsewhere, Beyoncé performed an amazing duet with Ed Sheeran, treating fans to an acoustic version of 'Drunk in Love'.Watch the music video for Naughty Boy and Beyoncé's 'Runnin' (Lose it All)' below:
